label: clinical_signal_03_dx_pain_management_trial_025
content:
## 2024-08-19 Daily Operations Summary

### Enrollment
- Total Enrolled: 110
- Active: 94
- Screen Failures Cumulative: 69
- Withdrawals Cumulative: 16

### Enrollment By Treatment Arm
- Multimodal: 36
- Standard: 36
- Placebo: 38

### Efficacy By Arm
- Multimodal VAS Pain Score Mean: 4.7
- Multimodal VAS Pain Score SD: 1.3
- Multimodal Morphine Equivalents (mg) Mean: 25.9
- Multimodal Morphine Equivalents (mg) SD: 10.2
- Multimodal Six Minute Walk Test (meters) Mean: 384.0
- Multimodal Six Minute Walk Test (meters) SD: 43.0
- Multimodal Grip Strength (kg) Mean: 27.5
- Multimodal Grip Strength (kg) SD: 3.6
- Multimodal Sleep Quality Index Mean: 5.8
- Multimodal Sleep Quality Index SD: 1.0
- Multimodal Rescue Med Doses Per Week Mean: 2.2
- Multimodal Rescue Med Doses Per Week SD: 1.6

- Standard VAS Pain Score Mean: 5.4
- Standard VAS Pain Score SD: 1.3
- Standard Morphine Equivalents (mg) Mean: 40.7
- Standard Morphine Equivalents (mg) SD: 9.3
- Standard Six Minute Walk Test (meters) Mean: 314.0
- Standard Six Minute Walk Test (meters) SD: 42.0
- Standard Grip Strength (kg) Mean: 23.7
- Standard Grip Strength (kg) SD: 5.2
- Standard Sleep Quality Index Mean: 4.8
- Standard Sleep Quality Index SD: 0.9
- Standard Rescue Med Doses Per Week Mean: 4.9
- Standard Rescue Med Doses Per Week SD: 1.9

- Placebo VAS Pain Score Mean: 6.6
- Placebo VAS Pain Score SD: 1.4
- Placebo Morphine Equivalents (mg) Mean: 48.1
- Placebo Morphine Equivalents (mg) SD: 7.6
- Placebo Six Minute Walk Test (meters) Mean: 271.0
- Placebo Six Minute Walk Test (meters) SD: 42.0
- Placebo Grip Strength (kg) Mean: 20.0
- Placebo Grip Strength (kg) SD: 3.3
- Placebo Sleep Quality Index Mean: 4.1
- Placebo Sleep Quality Index SD: 1.4
- Placebo Rescue Med Doses Per Week Mean: 6.7
- Placebo Rescue Med Doses Per Week SD: 1.2

### Physical Therapy
- Sessions Scheduled: 212
- Sessions Attended: 188
- Attendance Rate (%): 85.1

### Safety Labs
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) Mean: 14.2
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) SD: 1.1
- WBC (k) Mean: 7.3
- WBC (k) SD: 1.7
- Platelets (k) Mean: 231
- Platelets (k) SD: 44
- Serum Creatinine (mg/dL) Mean: 0.94
- Serum Creatinine (mg/dL) SD: 0.18
- Blood Glucose (mg/dL) Mean: 103.0
- Blood Glucose (mg/dL) SD: 12.0
- ESR (mm/hr) Mean: 8.0
- ESR (mm/hr) SD: 9.0

### Adverse Events
- AE ID: PM-AE-2504, Description: sedation, Grade: 1, Relatedness: unlikely related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: standard
- AE ID: PM-AE-2511, Description: urinary retention, Grade: 1, Relatedness: probably related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: standard

### Protocol Deviations
- PD ID: PM-PD-2539, Description: VAS assessment outside scheduled window, Severity: minor

### Events
- Pain diary electronic collection rate: 83%
- Opioid conversion table reference updated per FDA guidance

### Notes
- Week 25: Pain management assessments on track. 110 subjects enrolled across treatment arms. Functional outcomes within expected ranges.
